title: Crimslime
summaries: The Crimslime is a Hardmode slime found within the Crimson biome. It spawns with either 85%, 100%, or 115% of its usual size, with the stats altered accordingly. In the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it has a chance to inflict the Darkness debuff on contact.
Like most other slimes, the Crimslime will be passive towards any player with the Royal Gel(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) accessory equipped.
